dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 890 IH: To correct the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit P16.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clawson of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To correct the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit P16.

section.header: Replacement of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map

subsection.text: The map included in the set of maps entitled Coastal Barrier Resources System referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(a)) and relating to Unit P16 in Florida is hereby replaced by another map relating to the same unit entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Corrected Unit P16 and dated October 30, 2014.

The Secretary of the Interior shall keep the replacement map referred to in subsection (a) on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(b)).
